DOC.brief_summary: THE STUDY HAS BEEN DESIGNED TO COMPARE THE EFFICACY OF TWO DOSES ( 25 MG AND 100 MG ) OF RIFAXIMIN VAGINAL TABLETS VERSUS PLACEBO IN SUBJECTS WITH BACTERIAL VAGINOSIS
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Rifaximin Vaginal Tablets Bacterial Vaginosis
DOC.detailed_description: THIS IS A PHASE 2B , RANDOMIZED , DOUBLE-BLIND , PLACEBO CONTROLLED STUDY PLANNING TO ENROL 626 SUBJECTS AFFECTED BY BACTERIAL VAGINOSIS . PRIMARY ENDPOINT : TO COMPARE THE EFFICACY OF TWO DOSES ( 25 MG AND 100 MG ) OF RIFAXIMIN VAGINAL TABLETS VERSUS PLACEBO IN SUBJECTS WITH BACTERIAL VAGINOSIS SECONDARY ENDPOINT : TO COMPARE THE EFFICACY OF TWO DOSES ( 25 MG AND 100 MG ) OF RIFAXIMIN VAGINAL TABLETS VERSUS METROGEL VAGINAL IN SUBJECTS WITH BACTERIAL VAGINOSIS .
